show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, www.drznaturally.com interviews Dr. Sally Ward. Dr. <!--more--> Sally Ward, MD, practices holistic family medicine at ONE MEDICAL GROUP in San Francisco, with and emphasis on integrative medicine, lifestyle modification, and disease prevention.
Dr Ward is an energetic and dedicated caregiver and is also an accomplished physician leader with a passion for quality improvement.
She completed her residency at Dartmouth University where she also completed her Masters in Public health and held a chief residency position in preventive medicine.
She is certified by the American Board of Family Medicine and the American Board of Preventive Medicine.
Contact: www.onemedicine.com
